title: Nonna
typeOfFood: Lacto, Organic, Western, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Little alternative-feel restaurant with vintage furniture and grandma-porcelain in a hidden street close to the tourist-centre Monastriaki. Offers cooked warm as well cold dishes, around half of day's selection is vegetarian or vegan, sometimes even vegan cake. Makes its own lemonade.
